resources.string: Welcome to on-demand technology for logistics.
Are you sure you want to cancel the trip?
Enter the reason for trip cancellation
To proceed, you need to add a Warehouse. Click here to add a Warehouse
Please choose the file you want to upload.
© Copyright Ezyloads Logistics Pvt Ltd. 2021.\n All Rights Reserved.

Dear User,\nIf you experience any problem with the Application please feel free to contact us by writing an email to support@transo.in, including the problem description with your full name and phone number. Our support team will reach you.
File types that can be uploaded - csv, xlsx, xls.
I hereby authorize TRANSO to verify the documents provided.
Email Id and Password sent as sms to your registered mobile no.
Unable to connect to server. Please try after sometime.
Enter a valid email Id / Mobile No.
The password should be minimum 6 characters
Couldn\'t connect to server. Please try after sometime.
The applications needs this permission to read documents from your device.
Select at least one checkbox to proceed.
The entered Email Id / Mobile No. is not valid.
The entered weight is greater than the vehicle carriage capacity. Please select the weight <= the vehicle carriage capacity
The entered weight is greater than the vehicle carriage capacity. Do you wish to proceed?
No Vehicle found! Do you want to retry?
Enter a valid Consignor/Consignee Phone No.
Enter a valid Consignor/Consignee Email Id
The entered weight is more than the vehicle carrying capacity
The password should be minimum 6 characters
Input the consignment (box) measurements in cm
The entered chassis number already exists
The entered vehicle registration number already exists
The entered engine number already exists
Weight should not be more than 40 kg
Select vehicle Registration Certificate end date
Trip tracking not available right now.
The entered mobile number is not registered
Start sequence should be less than end sequence
Customer data not available. Please add a customer from the Administration menu
Customer data not available. Please add a customer from the Administration menu.
Customer address not available. Please add an address from the Administration menu.
User data not available. Please add a user from the Administration menu.
Warehouse data not available. Please add a warehouse from the Administration menu.
Address not available. Please add an address from the Administration menu or select an address on the map
Branch details not available. Please add a branch from the Administration menu

string.name: view_drop_file
string.u: Click here to download and view the drops file.

resources.string: Enter no. of LR\'s to be generated
Find below the LR no\'s generated
The LR number entered is in use for another drop location.
If you exit, the data you have entered will be cleared. Do you want to exit?
Pickup and Drop addresses cannot be the same.
No LR\'s available for this customer
New App version is available. Click Download to update now.
Please enter a value greater than zero
Source & destination sub branch cannot be same
Please select either Auto LR or Manual LR
Please select either Auto or Manual LR
A maximun of 10 LR\'s can be generated at a time.
Tracking status for this trip is not available right now. Please try after 5 mins
No Vendor data available. Please add a vendor from the Administration menu.
If you exit, your data will be lost. Do you want to exit?
Passwords do not match with. Try again.
You need to add at least 1 document
Are you sure want to approve the changes?
Selected trip has been booked without driver application.\nDo you wish to proceed with entering manual tracking data?
Do you want to mark the trip as completed?
Are you sure you want to complete this trip?
The entry for the number of boxes do not match
You don\'t have permission to use this App. Contact your administrator for help.
Pin and select the warehouse location on map
Origin and Destination zones cannot be the same.
State cannot be the same for origin and destination
City cannot be the same for origin and destination
Location cannot be the same for origin and destination
Do you want to approve the “Enable” status for commercial?
Do you want to approve the “Disable” status for commercial?
Select Vehicle Placed at Origin (Date & Time)
Select Vehicle Reporting at Destination (Date & Time)
Select Vehicle Release at Destination (Date & Time)
From Date should not exceed To Date
The selected entries will be added to customer wise os report and entries not selected will be in unbilled cn wise report.Please confirm.
The selected entries will be added to vendor wise os report.Please confirm.
The selected entries will be added to customer wise os report and entries not selected will be in unbilled cn wise report.Please confirm.
